-----Original Message-----
From: Henrik Holm [mailto:HEH@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 17, 2001 10:50 AM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Level 49 bard seeks equipment advice


Hi all,
Well Im an old bard with limited playtime and terribly unlucky when it comes
to rolls *grin*. However I got lucky and got some "Silver Chitin Hand Wraps"
this weekend. The stats are:
+5 AC +3 vsMg +3 vsFire +3 vsCold +3 vsPos +3 vsDis effect: Haste (reported
broken)
Now I wonder what I should do? Should I try to sell them? (How much will
they be worth?) Should I keep it for the haste when/if it get fixed? If I
sell em should I sell them before or after they get fixed? I only have
around 1-2kpp in the bank so these hand wraps is a nice oppotunity for me to
get something upgraded..
Any advice will be appriciated..

Musiker Silverdrum, bard o 49 songs, bertox

I currently use/have:
Instruments: Nostrolo tamborine, Mino horn, Storebought brass horn, Lute of
the Gypsy Princess
Primary Melee: Ykeshan War Club
Secondary Melee: Short Sword of the Ykesha
Ranged Weapon: Runed Bone Fork
Ear: Opalline Earring
Ear: Opalline Earring

Face: Mask of Deception
Head: Leatherfoot Raider Skullcap (Dropped Version) Or Guardian helmet AC11
some stats

Finger: Silver Fire Emerald ring

Wrist: Lambent Bracers
